definition: The act or ceremony of initiating an individual into a religious community, typically involving the application of water and often performed during infancy. It is commonly associated with Christian traditions and serves as a symbolic representation of spiritual purification and admission into the faith.

examples.german: Die Taufe findet in der Kirche statt.
examples.english: The baptism takes place in the church.

examples.german: Unser Baby wird nächste Woche getauft.
examples.english: Our baby will be baptized next week.

examples.german: Die Taufe ist ein wichtiges Sakrament in der christlichen Religion.
examples.english: Baptism is an important sacrament in the Christian religion.

examples.german: Bei der Taufe werden Wasser und Segen verwendet.
examples.english: Water and blessings are used during baptism.

examples.german: Die Taufe symbolisiert die Aufnahme in die Gemeinschaft der Gläubigen.
examples.english: Baptism symbolizes entry into the community of believers.
